content: Hi everyone! My name is Nicolas. I am currently studying CS at the University of Lille (France) after having completed a PhD in philosophy (same univ). I am particularly (but not only) interested in compilation, kernel dev, programming language theory and formal methods. I enjoy writing in Rust, though I am not an expert. I am eager to understand how rustc works and, eventually, contribute.
If it's up your alley, I think chalk might have some tasks opening soon.
Indeed, we always are interested in more help :)
Come join us at wg-traits stream if you're interested
Thanks, I've started to read the blog posts indicated on the github page.
